column4: ok, i need the Big Blue Room. i'm living exactly 27 seconds behind wickedpuppy
i am in singapore .. you should be closer than me
how will that find out about the release ? curious
kernel revision
he wants to know the ubuntu version .. not kernel version ...
the kernel revisions are not the same for all releases. if you tell me a kernel revision, i can tell you the release.
well .. sure you can do that but why would you ? since there are direct ways to find out about the release version ... i am not saying you are wrong there ...
i just like the uname method because it tells me both release and current kernel.
ok ... :P
hire a hooker?
that would be a good choice .. unfortunately you cant hire one if your backup is screwed in real life ..
boot to rescue mode or a lower runlevel
or off a live cd, or ...
true .. but i was thinking how he going to ask us for help if he can't use irc ?
CLI clients exist for IRC (i'm using one) ;)
irssi is installed by default
honestly ... i be surprised if people can stand irssi in trouble .. especially for newbies
thankfully not every user has such anger management issues ;)
yah .. i myself is glad ... i havn't received any hatemails so far ..
or you have an aggressive spam filter :D
then how does he save the edited xorg on the cd ? can it be done ?
he saves it to the mounted file system
